text: Kofiron guruh-guruh ʙa suji duzax ronda mesavand. Hamin ki ʙa on co merasand, darhojas kusoda megardad va nigahʙononas megujand: «Ojo pajomʙarone az mijoni xudi sumo ʙa suroƣaton naomadand, ki ojoti Parvardigoratonro ʙaroi sumo mexondand va dar ʙorai didori in ruz husdor medodand? Onon [dar posux] megujand: Ore, vale [mo inkorason kardem va] farmoni mucozot sazoi kofiron ast»
